reference_a:
@article{fisher2017,
  title = {Exploring the idiographic dynamics of mood and anxiety via network analysis},
  author = {Fisher, Aaron J. and Reeves, Jonathan W and Lawyer, Glenn and Medaglia, John D and Rubel, Julian A},
  date = {2017},
  journaltitle = {Journal of abnormal psychology},
  shortjournal = {Journal of abnormal psychology},
  volume = {126},
  number = {8},
  pages = {1044},
  publisher = {American Psychological Association},
  issn = {1939-1846},
  doi = {10.1037/abn0000311}
}
participants: participants with a diagnosis of MDD and/or GAD
additional_comments: item order was randomized; partially implicit missingness; no beep information

features.name: beep
features.coding: NA

features.name: energetic
features.coding:
To what degree have you felt energetic?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: enthusiastic
features.coding:
To what degree have you felt enthusiastic?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: content
features.coding:
To what degree have you felt content?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: irritable
features.coding:
To what degree have you felt irritable?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: restless
features.coding:
To what degree have you felt restless?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: worried
features.coding:
To what degree have you felt worried?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: guilty
features.coding:
To what degree have you felt worthless or guilty?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: afraid
features.coding:
To what degree have you felt frightened or afraid?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: anhedonia
features.coding:
To what degree have you experience loss of interest or pleasure?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: angry
features.coding:
To what degree have you felt angry?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: hopeless
features.coding:
To what degree have you felt hopeless?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: down
features.coding:
To what degree have you felt down or depressed?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: positive
features.coding:
To what degree have you felt positive?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: fatigue
features.coding:
To what degree have you felt fatigued?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: tension
features.coding:
To what degree have you experienced muscle tension?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: concentrate
features.coding:
To what degree did you have difficulty concentrating?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: accepted
features.coding: unclear

features.name: threatened
features.coding: unclear

features.name: ruminate
features.coding: unclear

features.name: avoid_act
features.coding:
To what degree did you avoid activities?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

features.coding:
To what degree did you seek reassurance?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

To what degree did you procrastinate?
0 = none at all
100 = as much as possible

features.coding: unclear

features.coding:
To what degree did you avoid people?
0 = none at all
